text:
Police are on the lookout for four persons who attempted to smuggle ganja from Punnaikaayal in the district on Sunday.

When fishermen of Punnaikaayal noticed the suspicious movement of a few unidentified people in the early hours near the spot where groyne was being created in the village, they alerted the Authoor police. When the police patrol team arrived at the spot around 6.30 a.m., four persons escaped after abandoning a lorry there.

When the police checked the vehicle, they recovered a bag with 33 parcels, all packed with 66 kg of ganja. The vehicle along with ganja was seized. Further investigations are on.
title: 66 kg of ganja seized
